Data: Kallis to Warner, no run a flat-batted punch straight down the ground, he wanted to pull it squarer but the length wasn't on, Kallis misfields in his followthrough but no chance of a single
Kallis to Warner, 1 run clubs a fuller delivery, Steyn runs to his left at mid-off and dives to save runs
Kallis to Marsh, no run pitched up and that one is well on-driven, except it cant beat mid-on
Kallis to Marsh, FOUR runs whats this? Marsh has pierced the off side, and with a rather lovely shot too, that one pitched marginally full outside off stump and Marsh struck it on the rise for four
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run hits a length and now he rotates the strike with a dab to the off side
Kallis to Warner, 1 wide thats a wide, sliding down the pads, no contact from Warner, Boucher takes
Kallis to Warner, 1 run comes forward and drives on the rise to mid-off, where Steyn tumbles
Ntini to Warner, no run pitches on a length, middle and off, Warner wants a run but his attempt to shuffle across the sticks and rotate a single doesn't work, the ball dribbles down the track
Ntini to Warner, 1 run nips in off a length to tuck up Warner, who hops and deflects it fine for one
Ntini to Marsh, no run ah, another one beats Marsh, who continues to flirt outside off stump, that pitched on the seam and wobbled away from the bat as Marsh went fishing, well bowled
Ntini to Marsh, 1 run gets some room and angles the bat on it, chopping just past gully
Ntini to Warner, no run well bowled, on the stumps, no room to work with, Warner gets behind the ball and shape to knock it to the on side but he mistimes it back to Ntini
Ntini to Warner, no run now its a full toss, which Warner cannot put past a diving JP Duminy at cover, so he has to stay on 49, much to the SCG's displeasure, they are backing the local boy
Kallis to Marsh, no run slower delivery on the stumps, cramping Marsh, who falls forward
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run hops up and turns that off the hips past midwicket for a single, to cheer!
Kallis to Warner, no run dragged in short around off stump, Warner goes for a swing and misses, drawing boos from the SCG

Kallis to Warner, 1 run now he gets to fifty, shuffling and turning the ball off his pads past square leg, there is some loud cheer from Warner's home crowd as he raises his maiden ODI half-century in his second match
Kallis to Marsh, 1 run pitches full, Marsh dabs it to extra cover, who is slow to react
Kallis to Warner, 1 run change of pace but too straight and Warner drives to mid-on for one
Morkel to Warner, no run 108.6ks, back of a length and cracked off the back foot to cover
Morkel to Warner, no run fuller, pitching outside leg stump and coming in, Warner pushes it back to Albie, cramped for room on the attempted on-drive past midwicket
Morkel to Warner, 1 run now he gets him away, turning the ball off his pads down to fine leg
Morkel to Marsh, no run 131.6ks, lands on middle and off and Marsh defends
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run straight again, off a shorter length, whipped to Duminy at deep midwicket
Morkel to Warner, 1 run makes room and skips out, exposing all three sticks, the ball starts to follow Warner and he turns it just wide of midwicket for a single
Kallis to Warner, FOUR runs makes room to smash that one over extra cover, one bounce and four

Kallis to Warner, no run a cramped one-handed shot from Warner this time, trying to cut one just not there for that short of shot, ends up chopping to point and Marsh has to turn back and scamper back to his mark
Kallis to Warner, SIX runs hah! Kallis drops in an attempted bouncer but Warner collects from off stump and swats it over the infield for a flat six, thats a tremendous shot, and what placement
Kallis to Warner, no run change of pace this time, sensibly, to draw a more conservative shot
Kallis to Warner, 1 run hops back and knocks this one off the hips for an easy single
Kallis to Marsh, 2 runs lands outside leg stump and Marsh works it off his pads to deep square
Morkel to Warner, 1 run lands on a length and he turns it off the stumps to wide of midwicket
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run short-pitched on leg stump and hooked down to Steyn at fine leg
Morkel to Warner, no run slower ball, pitches on leg stump, he wants to turn it fine but gets a leading edge that slowly pops up and drops short of Albie
Morkel to Warner, no run another slower ball and another leading edge, this one well safe to cover
Morkel to Warner, no run well bowled, Albie, pitching gently on the stumps and Warner defends
Morkel to Warner, 2 runs lands on leg stump, this time Warner gets one, driving past midwicket
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run pitches down leg stump and Marsh turns it down to deep square leg
Steyn to Warner, no run well bowled, 140ks, a lovely yorker on leg stump, dug out in time

Steyn to Warner, 1 run direct hit! Warner comes forward to the pitch of the ball and pushes it to the off side, Amla runs across from extra cover and nails a direct hit, the appeal is referred and it shows Warner just got his bat across the line
Steyn to Marsh, no run pitches on a length and Marsh pushes the ball to Amla at cover
Steyn to Marsh, FOUR runs better timing and placement from Marsh, who gets over a marginally fuller ball and drives it straight back past the stumps, this one mid-off cannot cut off
Steyn to Marsh, no run 144ks, pitches just outside leg stump and Marsh plays it back
Morkel to Warner, 1 run walks away to the sixth stump and goes inside-out down to long-off
Morkel to Marsh, no run 111ks, pitches on leg stump and clipped aerially to midwicket
Morkel to Marsh, no run another dot ball as Marsh drives but cannot pierce cover or point

Morkel to Marsh, FOUR runs there's a shot! Marsh picks the shorter delivery and pulls it off one leg, over the infield and just over Duminy running back at deep midwicket, Albie thought he had his man but Marsh picked the spot
Morkel to Marsh, 2 runs slower ball on the pads, turned through square for a couple more
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run hits a length on off stump and Marsh knocks it down toward mid-off
Steyn to Marsh, no run 144ks, dug in short, Marsh opts to pull but takes his eyes off the ball and it strikes him on the pads well over the stumps, that one sort of skidded on to Marsh
Steyn to Marsh, no run pitches on the pads and he knocks that one into the on side
Steyn to Marsh, 2 runs too straight again and he gets up to turn that one wide of square leg
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run again outside leg stump and flicked away for another easy single
Steyn to Warner, 5 wide sloppy, too much swing down leg stump, beating poor Boucher as well
Steyn to Warner, OUT you miss, I hit, mate! Full, fast and straight on the stumps, Warner swings across the stumps and cannot connect and Steyn flattens his leg stump, terminating a fun innings
Steyn to Ponting, no run beaten first ball, pushing at one pitched up outside off, well bowled
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run angling across and he bunts that from outside off stump to midwicket
Morkel to Ponting, no run hits a length and starts to straighten, Ponting punches it back to Albie
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs gets off the mark with a good shot, driven on the up past cover, no chance for the fielder to stop that one, wasn't a half-volley but Ponting collected on the rise
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs after the caress comes the club, as Ponting, in a flash, pulls that off the front foot, up and over midwicket for his second boundary in two balls
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs make it three in row, and note to self - do not bowl short to this man! Ponting gets across and paddle-pulls one drifting down leg stump up and over square leg
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run ah, gets a full toss but only manages to bunt a single down the ground
Steyn to Ponting, 3 runs too straight and Ponting unfurls the vintage pull shot, its a good shot but Duminy covers plenty of ground from deep midwicket and dives to flick the ball back
Steyn to Marsh, no run hits a length and he falls forward as he tries to tuck it away for one
Steyn to Marsh, 1 wide slides down the pads, there's a faint noise, Boucher collects and asks
Steyn to Marsh, 4 leg byes too straight and Marsh gets a faint tickle off the pads and its away
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run again he serves up on leg stump, 145ks, so Marsh flicks it away
Steyn to Ponting, no run good ball, short of a length on off stump and he defends
Steyn to Ponting, no run a good length this time, drawing Ponting forward, defending to cover
Morkel to Marsh, 1 run pitches on middle and angles away, Marsh gets across and pokes it away
Morkel to Ponting, no run comes forward and pushes the ball to the off side
Morkel to Ponting, no run comes onto the front foot and hammers the ball, very flat, to mid-off
Morkel to Ponting, no run fuller in length, hitting the seam, and he pushes it to point
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run comes back in this time but he counters with a firm on-drive for one
Morkel to Marsh, no run hits a length and this one is pushed straight to the fielders
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up gently, luring Ponting well forward, he drives into the off side
Botha to Marsh, no run tossed up on middle and leg, some turn and Marsh defends to the off

Botha to Marsh, FOUR runs quicker ball turns down the pads, Marsh goes for the sweep and gets well across the stumps, Boucher and Botha appeal but there was the faintest of inside edges as he placed it very fine around the corner for four
Botha to Marsh, no run tossed up and he defends

Botha to Marsh, OUT smart work from Boucher, who collects the ball as it pitches and straightens to beat Marsh's attempted sweep to one outside off stump, Marsh drags his back leg just over the line and in a flash Boucher breaks the stumps, so Botha gets some succe
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up to bring Hussey forward, pushing toward cover
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run pitches wide, Ponting knocks the ball to point, where Albie slides well
Duminy to Hussey, 1 wide tossed up wide and no shot offered, the umpire spreads his wings
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run comes onto the front foot and drives through the covers for one
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, Ponting takes it on the half-volley and drives to extra cover
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run gently tossed up on off stump, Hussey pushes on the rise to the off
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run tossed up and turned wide of backward point for one more
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run fired in full and flat, and he uses his feet and drives it straight
Botha to Hussey, FOUR runs short and pulled to deep midwicket, cracking shot there
Botha to Hussey, no run much slower, tossed up on the stumps and Hussey defends
Botha to Hussey, 1 run comes across and works this one away for a quick single
Botha to Ponting, no run tossed up, Ponting steers it to Amla on the off and wants one, but nope
Botha to Ponting, 1 run uses his feet and clips this one wide of the fielder for one
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up on a length, hint of turn, defended off the front foot to point
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run tossed up and he bunts a single down the ground
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run too much drift down leg stump and Hussey sweeps it away
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run smart running, dabbed away and they sprint off, beating the throw
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run serves up a low full toss which Hussey punches into the off side
Duminy to Ponting, 1 run tossed up and it drifts into the pads, Ponting turns it to midwicket
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run another easy single, turned off the pads between midwicket and mid-on
Botha to Hussey, no run some turn there, away from middle and off, Hussey defends it back
Botha to Hussey, 1 run just a tad too short and he punches it into the covers for a single
Botha to Ponting, 1 run too short for sure and he rocks back to punch between cover and point
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up just outside off stump and pushed straight to point

Botha to Hussey, OUT well done, de Villiers! Botha tosses it up wider, drawing a flashy drive off the edge to backward point, where de Villiers runs across, collects, and returns a flat throw on top of the stumps to Boucher, Hussey has set off and turns back and di
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up on off stump, Hussey comes across and turns to midwicket
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run pitches outside off stump and Ponting square-drives on the rise
Kallis to Hussey, 2 runs pitches it up and Hussey drives on the up, finding the gap at cover for two
Kallis to Hussey, 1 run slower ball, 117ks, commits Hussey on the front foot and he adjusts well, playing it late and with soft hands, steering down to third man for a single
Kallis to Ponting, 1 run comes onto the front foot and drives out to the sweeper at deep cover
Kallis to Hussey, no run hits a length and he pushes that to the fielder
Kallis to Hussey, no run straighter delivery, flicked across the line but straight to midwicket
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up fine, Ponting paddles it around the corner to fine leg
Botha to Hussey, 1 run flatter delivery which Hussey collects on the full and flicks across the line

Botha to Ponting, OUT what a simple dismissal, its gently tossed up and Ponting just plays across his pads to short midwicket, who stumbles a couple feet forward and accepts the offering, easy as can be
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up slowly again, Haddin pushes down the track
Botha to Haddin, no run again he pushes it back and Botha gets across to stop the ball
Botha to Haddin, no run clips this one to the on side where the fielding is decidedly sprightly
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on off stump, turned with the spin down to mid-on
Duminy to Haddin, no run tossed up, some turn, Haddin works it uppishly to midwicket
Duminy to Haddin, 1 run comes out and turns it to midwicket, calling for the urgent single
Duminy to Hussey, no run slowly lobbed up outside off, drawing him forward in defence
Duminy to Hussey, no run slowly tossed up and this one is turned to the on side fielder
Duminy to Hussey, 2 runs ah, well bowled, tossed up every so gently and that one is driven on the rise just over the head of extra cover
Botha to Haddin, no run strides well forward and across the stumps to block this one back

Botha to Haddin, 1 run a misfield from Duminy! The length forces Haddin back, he flicks across the line, Duminy moves across from midwicket but fumbles the collection, otherwise Hussey was gone for all money
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up and he works it across the line for one
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up and he plays it to the fielder
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up and gets him driving but he cannot beat cover
Botha to Haddin, 1 run tosses it up, he comes out and turns the ball to the onside, sets off, again the nonstriker is struggling to make it but Boucher breaks the stumps just a frame too late
Duminy to Haddin, no run tossed up and played out solidly
Duminy to Haddin, 1 run skips out and drills that very firmly back past the stumps
Duminy to Hussey, no run tossed up on the stumps and he defends
Duminy to Hussey, FOUR runs invites the drive with one tossed up too wide and Hussey reaches out to drive over extra cover for four
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run this one pitches on the stumps and turns fine, Hussey deflects it away
Duminy to Haddin, 1 run collects on the full and drives this down the ground to long-off
Botha to Haddin, 1 run pushes him onto the back foot and he drives in the air toward mid-on
Botha to Hussey, 1 run collects on the full and whips it across the line to midwicket for one
Botha to Haddin, OUT Haddin's gone, and Botha has a third! Tossed up, lures Haddin out of his crease, he drives it low and flat back to Botha, who holds it very well and then throws it up
Botha to Hopes, no run tossed up, Hopes goes back and defends watchfully
Botha to Hopes, 1 run again he pushes him back and across and he plays it back
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up, Hussey flicks from outside off, nearly to short midwicket
Duminy to Hopes, no run slides down the pads and that one is turned to square leg
Duminy to Hopes, no run opens the face and dabs that straight to the fielder
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run comes out and turns that wide of the fielder for a single
Duminy to Hussey, no run drives it back and Duminy dives across to stop off his own bowling
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off stump and he drives this down to deep mid-off
Duminy to Hopes, no run slowly tossed up on the pads and he turns it right to midwicket
Botha to Hussey, no run tossed up and defended
Botha to Hussey, 1 run comes across and clips off the stumps to wide of midwicket
Botha to Hopes, 1 run too straight this time and he works it off his pads past square leg
Botha to Hussey, no run slower ball on middle and off, defended to the on side
Botha to Hussey, 1 run slides down and he knocks it to the on side for one this time
Botha to Hopes, 1 run a touch shorter and we see a rare back-foot shot, just wide of cover
Morkel to Hopes, no run full and swinging, well clipped but McKenzie flings around and stops
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run short of a length, tapped into the off side, sprints off, fielder collects and fires the throw but Hussey is just home safe
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run gets a wee bit of room and he runs it down to third man for one
Morkel to Hopes, no run pitches on off stump, driven loosely toward midwicket, who dives
Morkel to Hopes, no run back of a length on the stumps and he gets in line to defend
Morkel to Hopes, FOUR runs pitched up wider, Hopes reaches for it and drives on the rise through a diving cover fielder and gets four to his name, that was truly a powerful shot
Botha to Hussey, 1 run good shot for one, tossed up and Hussey clips past midwicket in style
Botha to Hopes, no run tossed up again and another flick, but Gibbs intercepts
Botha to Hopes, 1 run lobbed up on the stumps and he drives that down the ground
Botha to Hussey, 1 run comes out and gets the wrists into play, working wide of mid-on
Botha to Hopes, no run flighted up, turns back in, batsman goes back and across
Botha to Hopes, 1 run bit too wide on that occasion and Hopes drives into the covers for one
Duminy to Hopes, no run flat stuff, forcing Hopes back and he punches to the bowler
Duminy to Hopes, no run gently tossed up and Hopes drives it down toward mid-on
Duminy to Hopes, no run tossed up again, Duminy moves across to his right and cuts it off
Duminy to Hopes, no run and again, flighted up and he mistimes the drive to the fielder
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run now he breaks the shackles with a steered single into the off side
Duminy to Hussey, no run very well done, Duminy, tossed up on the stumps and turned to midwicket
Botha to Hopes, no run flighted up gently on the stumps, Hopes plays it to midwicket
Botha to Hopes, no run more lovely flight and dip and his flick is cut off by a diving midwicket
Botha to Hopes, no run flighted up again and he clips the ball to the man at midwicket
Botha to Hopes, 1 run a touch wider and he gets room to push the ball toward extra cover
Botha to Hussey, no run comes onto the front foot and pushes the ball to point
Botha to Hussey, 1 run gets his front foot out and turns the ball across his pad, beating mid-on
Duminy to Hussey, no run slowly tossed up outside off, Hussey nudges it down to short third man
Duminy to Hussey, no run comes forward and flicks it to midwicket, no chance of a run there
Duminy to Hussey, 2 runs produces the sweep now, just getting enough on it to beat square leg
Duminy to Hussey, no run tossed up and defended
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run tossed up, flicked off the pads to Ntini at deep square leg
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run drives firmly off the front foot, Duminy misfields and allows one
Botha to Hopes, 1 run short ball, Hopes moves back and pushes down the ground
Botha to Hussey, no run full and flat, well bowled, clipped straight to midwicket

Botha to Hussey, 1 leg bye shout for leg before, the ball straightens down the leg stump and the batsman gets a leg bye, he was hit in front of about middle and leg, a very good shout, replays show it was turning down the stumps
Botha to Hopes, no run tossed up and defended
Botha to Hopes, no run tossed up again, gets well forward and struck outside the line
Botha to Hopes, no run comes forward and pushes the ball back, another ambitious shout
Morkel to Hussey, 3 runs slowly pitched up to tempt the drive, he goes for it and just beats short cover
Morkel to Hopes, no run goes for another drive and misses, well taken by Boucher
Morkel to Hopes, 2 runs short and wide and carved out to Duminy at deep cover
Morkel to Hopes, FOUR runs now thats well played by Hopes, swiping across the line over midwicket
Morkel to Hopes, no run pitches on a drivable length and Hopes plays straight to cover
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run pitches very full again and he hits it very hard into the off side
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on the stumps and he flicks it to deep midwicket
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run dances down the track and drives inside-out to deep cover
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run drives it back to Duminy's right, a fumble allows them one to mid-on
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run comes out, Duminy sees him and fires it in, he flicks and Gibbs dives
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run comes out and nudges that one down to de Villiers in the deep
Duminy to Hopes, no run gives him some room but he can only drive to McKenzie at extra cover

Ntini to Hussey, OUT hah, he's missed a rank waist high full toss! Ntini slips it out and Hussey just does not pick it as he opens the face to steer it fine, makes no contact and back goes middle stump
Ntini to Johnson, 1 run from around the stumps, short of a length, and steered past point
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run overpitched and Hopes firmly drives through the covers for a single
Ntini to Johnson, 1 run angles in off a length, just defended in the off side and he sprints
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run swings back in to leg stump, Hopes makes room and on-drives one
Ntini to Johnson, FOUR runs great timing, thats pitched up and he punches it off the middle and picks the gap between covers and even a sprinting sweeper fails to cut it off, very pleasing stroke
Duminy to Hopes, no run tossed up on the stumps, turned from off stump to midwicket
Duminy to Hopes, no run tossed up and thats a very sturdy piece of defensive work
Duminy to Hopes, no run decides to clip this one but cannot beat midwicket
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run lunges forward and turns it just wide of the midwicket fielder
Duminy to Hussey, 1 wide slides down leg stump for a wide, Boucher collects cleanly
Duminy to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on off stump, nudged toward square leg for one
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run plants the front pad in line and whips that away through midwicket
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run what a bad ball, a wide full toss and he can only slap out to deep cover
Ntini to Hussey, no run throws the bat at width but cannot beat backward point
Ntini to Hussey, FOUR runs pushes at another wider one, the attempted yorker, and opens the face to squeeze it down to third man for a welcome boundary to Australia
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run another attempted yorker, this one swinging down the pads, clipped fine
Ntini to Hopes, no run pitches on a length and he drives that toward point
Ntini to Hopes, no run shorter ball, sliding back with the angle, forced straight to backward point
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run dances down and swings across the line, just manages the toe end of the bat on the ball and drags it down into the midwicket region for a single
Duminy to Johnson, no run tossed up on a length and he defends it back watchfully
Duminy to Johnson, 1 wide slides down the pads, Boucher collects
Duminy to Johnson, FOUR runs good shot, just kneels down and swings over mid-wicket for four
Duminy to Johnson, OUT dragged on! Johnson dances down, making room, and swings and misses and gets a faint under edge that cannons back into the base of the stumps
Duminy to Hauritz, 2 runs and he gets off the mark immediately, tucking two past square leg
Duminy to Hauritz, FOUR runs tosses it up wide, he reaches out and swings it past midwicket in style
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run pitches outside off stump and he flashes the drive through cover
Steyn to Hauritz, 1 run slower ball on middle and leg, Hauritz shuffles and dabs it away
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run dragged in short outside off stump, Hopes fetches it and pulls to long-on
Steyn to Hauritz, OUT pitches it up, Hauritz makes room and tries to drive inside-out but finds Botha, stationed at cover, running backward to take a neat catch over his head
Steyn to Hopes, no run hits a length and he pokes at it, missing by not much, well bowled
Steyn to Hopes, no run slower ball, short of a length, steered just short of Gibbs at backward point
Ntini to Bracken, 1 run pitches full and Bracken pushes it into the covers for a quick single
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run full on the stumps, makes room and clips to Botha at midwicket
Ntini to Bracken, 2 runs good stroke on the rise, punching the ball into the gap at extra cover
Ntini to Bracken, 1 run full in the slot, no room to work with, squeezed into the off side for one

Ntini to Hopes, OUT oh well taken, Botha! Ntini gets another by pitching full down leg stump, getting the ball to swing in with the angle, Hopes chips it off the pads low in the air towards Botha, staying back on the circle, who then runs across and dives to hold a
Ntini to Bracken, 1 run ah, this one slides in and draws an inside edge back onto the flap as Bracken pushes tentatively at it, the ball then proceeds to deflect down toward gully
Steyn to Bracken, 1 run short of a length and he forces it off the back foot to backward point

Steyn to Tait, OUT whats happening here? Tait hops away toward square leg and drops the short delivery to the off side, Bracken sets off but there is no reaction from Tait, who is ball watching, suddenly both men are at one end and Tait had no chance to get back as
" target="_blank">Cricinfo Daily for all the latest news.
We'll be back for the chase in roughly 35 minutes. You could spend the break checking got a special edition Australia-South Africa quiz, or subscribing to the

So South Africa do well to dismiss Australia inside 50 overs. Still, a target of 270 is not easy under lights. There has been a good crowd in and they are looking at a competitive total. The spinners, especially Botha, bowled very well and tied down runs as well as taking
Welcome back for the second innings. South Africa's openers are set to go. In steams Tait.
Tait to Amla, no run banged in short outside off stump and Amla drops his hands to allow it go
Tait to Amla, no run 148.8ks, Amla hops up to cut and David Hussey dives up at point, intercepts it superbly and throws at the nonstriker's end, missing and Gibbs is safe

Tait to Amla, 2 runs edged and dropped by Ponting, who clutches to his left side from second slip and fluffs what should have been Michael Hussey's chance a first slip, then he allows a couple to boot, so a lucky break for Amla ... that was well bowled, back of a le
Tait to Amla, 1 wide pitches rather wide of the stumps
Tait to Amla, 1 run pitches outside off stump again and Amla steers a single away
Tait to Gibbs, no run ah, well done, pitches it up and beats a loose waft outside off stump

Tait to Gibbs, no run another drop! This one is by David Hussey at backward point, who falls forward to try and cup a loose thick outside edge from Gibbs' bat as the flings it a wide delivery, but the fielder fails to hold on .. my oh my what an opening over
Bracken to Amla, no run hits a length and he keeps that one out
Bracken to Amla, no run pitches on leg stump and curls back in, Amla tucks it to midwicket
Bracken to Amla, no run pitches full to bring Amla forward, swings back and he pushes to cover
Bracken to Amla, FOUR runs argh, more frustration for Australia as Amla drives without much footwork and gets an inside edge back past leg stump and Haddin for a fortuitous boundary
Bracken to Amla, no run pitches full again and this time Amla pushes firmly to cover
Bracken to Amla, 1 run full on the pads and delicately twirled down to deep square leg
Tait to Amla, no run 150.9ks, short and a bit wide and Amla cuts straight to point
Tait to Amla, 2 runs short and wide again and this time he laces it behind point for two
Tait to Amla, 1 run well bowled, the attempted yorker, full and swinging, Amla gets across and jams bat down on it, and then runs very well to scamper across the other end, well backed by Gibbs
Tait to Gibbs, 1 run another tailing yorker, 148ks, it so nearly snuck through but Gibbs dug it out to the on side and gets off the mark
Tait to Amla, 1 run short again, Amla rides the bounce and chops it in front of point for one
Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs amazing shot that from Gibbs, who doesn't move around much, instead going back and chipping the ball, totally using the pace, over mid-on for a one-bounce four

Bracken to Amla, no run pitches and comes in, Amla squirts it to the off side, sets off, Gibbs says where do you think you're going as two fielders converge, Amla has to retrace his steps and only survives because the throw was off the mark
Bracken to Amla, 1 leg bye too straight and Amla glances it off the pads down to fine leg
Bracken to Gibbs, no run pitches outside leg, tails in, Gibbs pushes it back to Bracken
Bracken to Gibbs, no run short of a length, again outside leg stump, turned to midwicket
Bracken to Gibbs, no run starts to come out, Bracken sees him and holds back the length and all Gibbs can do is steer it to the off side off the front foot, that was well bowled
Bracken to Gibbs, no run shorter this time and he gets the wrists into play, turning it fine
Tait to Amla, no run short, on the stumps, tucks Amla up, who has no room to make anything out of this and plays it back to Tait
Tait to Amla, 1 run pitched up, fast at 151ks, Amla goes for it, a wristy square-drive goes through vacant gully region
Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs vintage Gibbsy, premedidates, steps down, meets Tait on the half volley, and lofts him over his head, one bounce for four, this was no power, just a chip
Tait to Gibbs, no run pitched up further, 153ks, Gibbs goes for a lofted cover-drive, but misses completely
Tait to Gibbs, 1 run another quick delivery, 153ks, pitched up, driven to cover
Tait to Amla, no run tries a bouncer, just outside off, Amla takes a half movement forward, drops his wrists, and sways out of the line
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs another typical Gibbs shot first up, this was wide and pitched up, and Gibbs opens the face and deliberately chips it over cover

Johnson to Gibbs, OUT Suicide! run-ut, Gibbs is beaten by the extra bounce, and sees Amla charging down even before he has recovered, takes one step down but realises there is no single in this as Warner is charging at it from cover. it's an easy chip from Warner an
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs Gibbsy is not affected meanwhile, a lovely cover-drive... another wide, pitched-up delivery, and caressed through the covers
Johnson to Gibbs, no run pitched up outside off again, but Gibbs doesn't connect properly and plays straight to cover
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run on the pads, played to just wide of mid-on for a single

Johnson to Kallis, 2 runs Kallis gets an inside edge first up, this is pitched up outside off, and Kallis looks for a drive without any foot movement. Lucky not to play this on, he will get a single too
Bracken to Gibbs, no run straight, on the pads, but Gibbs can't beat the midwicket
Bracken to Gibbs, no run slower ball, 117.8ks, it's on the pads, and Gibbs looks to paddle it but is early into the shot
Bracken to Gibbs, no run a little shimmy down the track, Bracken pulls this one back, and Gibbs plays it back to the bowler
Bracken to Gibbs, 1 run this is a touch loose, thrown across Gibbs this time, he looks to free his arms, but plays aerially through gully region
Bracken to Kallis, no run accurate, pitched around leg, angling across towards off, played watchfully by Kallis
Bracken to Kallis, no run another accurate delivery on the stumps, and played back to the bowler
Johnson to Gibbs, SIX runs great use of the feet, backing away to leg stump, making room to loft that inside out and over extra cover for a big six to set the fans down in that stand alive
Johnson to Gibbs, no run comes out again and pushes with one hand, the ball beats bat
Johnson to Gibbs, no run charges down but Johnson slips in a yorker outside off stump which Gibbs cannot put away this time
Johnson to Gibbs, no run slips in a short delivery this time to draw a leading edge from the bat as Gibbs jumps across his stumps, it pops up in the air but evades Johnson, running to his right
Johnson to Gibbs, 4 byes Haddin is having a tough time out there, failing to collect one that stays low and beats the bat and then doesn't carry properly to the wicketkeeper
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs smack, go fetch! Johnson drops fractionally short and Gibbs collects in style from outside off stump, bisecting two fielders on the leg side
Hopes to Kallis, no run starts off on a tidy length and commits Kallis onto the front foot, blocking
Hopes to Kallis, 2 runs comes forward and drives, threading the gap at cover
Hopes to Kallis, no run back of a length this time and Kallis is concrete in defence
Hopes to Kallis, FOUR runs delicious shot, not a bad ball from Hopes but Kallis walks across his stumps, then flicks it superbly past midwicket for four
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run serves it up wide, Kallis square-drives, David Hussey dives to save runs
Hopes to Gibbs, no run pitches full and Gibbs comes forward to defend it to the off side
Johnson to Kallis, no run ah lovely, pitches on the seam and goes on with the angle to square up Kallis, who pushes down the wrong line and the ball beats the outside edge
Johnson to Kallis, FOUR runs a gift-wrapped half-volley and he square-drives it with class for four
Johnson to Kallis, no run now that did not bounce! Johnson pitches shorter and the ball scoots across the turf, well underneath Kallis' bat as he flirts at it, and Haddin manages to stop it
Johnson to Kallis, no run fuller in length and Kallis mistimes the drive to the off side
Johnson to Kallis, no run 134.8ks, back of a length and Kallis goes back to defend it
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run short down the stumps and he works it off the hips for a single
Hopes to Kallis, no run pitches on a good length and some very tidy defensive stuff from Kallis
Hopes to Kallis, no run a shimmy and Kallis clips extravagantly, but straight to midwicket
Hopes to Kallis, no run miscues another drive, this one a booming one to mid-off
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run pitches on leg and swings in, Kallis shuffles and flicks a single
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run pitches just outside off stump and he angles it to backward point
Hopes to Kallis, no run and he stays there, for now, because Hopes bowls a stump-to-stump delivery which Kallis has to defend down to backward point
Johnson to Gibbs, no run slower ball, attempted yorker outside off stump, no shot offered
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run short of a length on leg stump and he muscles it to midwicket
Johnson to Kallis, no run short of a length outside off and he goes back to defend to cover
Johnson to Kallis, no run good bowling, pitches on middle and leg and curls away and Kallis gets right in line with the ball, pushing it back with a straight face
Johnson to Kallis, 1 wide what is that? That slips out of Johnson's hands and flies well wide of Kallis at about shoulder length, surprising Kallis, then Haddin collects it well
Johnson to Kallis, 1 leg bye goes to flick one outside leg stump but no bat, so leg byes
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs fun to watch, is Gibbs, who rides the bounce of a short delivery and paddle-pulls it over square leg for four, that was a controlled and confident shot
Hopes to Kallis, no run pitches on the stumps and he tries an on-drive, but mistimed
Hopes to Kallis, no run nips back in off the seam and Kallis defends to cover
Hopes to Kallis, no run slides down the stumps, he goes to pull but ball hits thigh pad
Hopes to Kallis, no run comes forward and drives down the ground, mid-off cuts it off

Hopes to Kallis, 1 run and Jacques Kallis joins the 10,000 club with that shot, just opening the face and coolly running it down to third man for a single, he jogs down the track and takes off his helmet to acknowledge the applause from the SCG, what a player he ha

Hopes to Gibbs, FOUR runs innovative shot that from Gibbs, pushing forward and then at the last minute twirling the bat to send the ball racing away safely past Haddin and no chance for third man to cut it off
Tait to Kallis, FOUR runs a loose shot, reaching out to drive and Kallis gets a thick outside edge well safe of the slips, Tait shakes his head and walks back to his mark
Tait to Kallis, 1 run 146.4ks, a late-swirling yorker going down leg stump, Kallis falls across and then clips the ball to midwicket
Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs great shot from Gibbs, shimmying down and driving all along the grass, past extra cover, who only has to go and retrieve the ball from the ropes

Tait to Gibbs, FOUR runs well now, thats one of those shots which you just stand back and admire and say well played, mate! Again Gibbs comes down the track and this time just pushes the ball into that gap at extra cover for four more
Tait to Gibbs, no run expectedly, Tait drops it short and Gibbs miscues the cut to point
Tait to Gibbs, 2 runs stands his ground and steers the ball wide of point to raise a great fifty
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run swings down the pads and he clips it behind square leg for one
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 leg bye pitches outside the line and slants down, Gibbs gets across and plays a paddle shot, misses out on the bat, they all appeal but it was doing too much
Hopes to Kallis, no run drives from the crease and misses, well taken by Haddin
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run comes forward and rolls the wrists, late, to pinch another past square leg
Hopes to Gibbs, FOUR runs shorter delivery, not that wide but Gibbs gets on top of it and sends it screeching away behind point and even third man, covering good ground, cannot cut it off
Hopes to Gibbs, 2 runs a loose drive off the front foot this time, but safely in the air past point
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run gently tossed up and Kallis drives handsomely past extra cover
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run comes across and paddles this from off stump to short fine leg
Hauritz to Kallis, 2 runs gives it some air and Kallis squirts an outside edge wide of gully
Hauritz to Kallis, no run goes back to cut and survives with an under edge onto his boot
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run floats it up wider and Kallis chases it with a square-drive behind point
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run tossed up on off stump, Gibbs gently turns it straight to square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run pitches on a length and Kallis dabs it very late off the face of the bat
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run too straight and thats turned with the angle for one to deep square leg
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run pitches on a length, Kallis again glides it toward third man
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run it all looks rather easy at the moment, with Gibbs also running one fine
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run goes back and punches this one off the back foot into the covers
Hopes to Gibbs, 1 run well played, Gibbs gets well across the stumps and paddles this from outside off down to deep square leg, where it is cut off by the sweeper
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 wide moves across and paddles, misses and the ball nearly hits leg stump, Haddin shuffles across and cannot connect cleanly so the ball deflects away
Hauritz to Gibbs, 2 runs flighted down the pads and Gibbs runs it off away to fine leg for two
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 wide pitches and flights down leg stump, and thats wide
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run tossed up down the stumps, he gets across and misses the sweep
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run goes back and tries to run it fine but makes a mess
Hauritz to Gibbs, 1 run flighted up again and he connects with the sweep this time
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run tosses it up and draws a leading edge into the covers, well bowled
Hauritz to Gibbs, no run taps it to midwicket, sets off, there's confusion but all is well
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run pitches on the stumps and he turns it to midwicket, then sprints
Johnson to Gibbs, no run dabs a short ball to the off side, sets off a few paces, Marsh collects and Kallis, who has to turn back, survives because the throw is astray
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run makes room and skips out, Johnson follows him cleverly, and Gibbs does well to remove the front leg and squirts an inside edge down to backward square leg
Johnson to Kallis, FOUR runs wonderful placement, clipping in the air past square leg
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run pitches outside leg stump and Kallis taps it to midwicket for one

Johnson to Gibbs, OUT finally Australia hold one, its just catching practice from Gibbs, not moving as he reaches out and plays it off the face of the bat smack to first slip, who cups it in front of his face

Hauritz to Kallis, no run big shout from Hauritz, who flights it up outside the line and then beats Kallis as he shuffles across, they all go up in appeal and thats a very good call from the umpire Ian Gould, as replays show it pitched just outside the line
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run gets forward and pushes the away for a quick single
Hauritz to de Villiers, 1 run off the mark first ball, turning the ball off his stumps for one
Hauritz to Kallis, no run turns it off the stumps to short fine leg, de Villiers says no thanks
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run flights it up wider to get Kallis coming forward, steering past point
Hauritz to de Villiers, FOUR runs a shot of twinkle-toed confidence early in his innings, just waltzing down and clipping with the turn, placing it over midwicket and there's no stopping that
Johnson to Kallis, no run very full just outside off and Kallis miscues the shot to midwicket
Johnson to Kallis, no run beaten! That pitches back of a length and goes on with the natural angle, staying a shade low to beat the edge of the bat as Kallis pushes for it loosely, well bowled
Johnson to Kallis, no run 133ks, on middle and leg and turned uppishly to midwicket
Johnson to Kallis, FOUR runs oh well played, Johnson drops it a tad shorter and in a flash Kallis scoops it off one leg, and into the yawning spaces behind square leg
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run much fuller outside off stump and punched into the covers, a sharp call for the single and the cover fielder misses the stumps
Johnson to de Villiers, no run much better length this time and AB can only defend to cover
Bracken to Kallis, no run hits a length and stays low to scoot past the edge of the bat
Bracken to Kallis, 2 runs comes forward and bisects the gap, runs hard for the second
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run comes onto the front foot and drives, ball stays low and rolls past
Bracken to Duminy, no run pitches outside off stump and no shot offered
Bracken to Duminy, no run banged in short and he pushes and misses, well bowled
Johnson to Kallis, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, Kallis clips it past midwicket
Johnson to Kallis, 1 wide very, very full and wide and Kallis resists having a go, smartly
Johnson to Kallis, 1 run pitches on leg stump, he shuffles and turns it away to raise fifty
Johnson to Duminy, no run pitches full and wide and Duminy shoulders arms
Johnson to Duminy, 2 runs slips up a full toss, Duminy does well to clip it past midwicket
Johnson to Duminy, no run full on middle and off, flicked with the swing straight to midwicket
Johnson to Duminy, no run 138.4ks, short of a length and he defends it solidly
Bracken to Kallis, 1 run pitches on about leg stump and Kallis gets across, tucking it fine
Bracken to Duminy, no run shorter and he tries to flick it on the hop, but mistimes it back
Bracken to Duminy, no run well bowled, hits the upright seam and wobbles back in to beat Duminy
Bracken to Duminy, no run lures him forward with a fuller one and Duminy edges to gully
Bracken to Duminy, no run drives a full one again and this time cannot beat backward point

Bracken to Duminy, no run pitches short of a length and gets some extra bounce, Duminy pushes at it away from the body and misses, Haddin collects and appeals, then Bracken joins in, but the umpire is not interested
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run hits a good length and seams in and Kallis pushes to the off side
Hopes to Duminy, no run pitches and straightens and Duminy hops back to defend it
Hopes to Duminy, no run sees width and chases it, only to under-edge into the off side
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run short of a length and he drives into the covers off the back foot, there's a moment of hesitation between the batsmen before they eventually set off
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run goes back and plays the ball just wide of the fielders this time
Hopes to Duminy, no run lands on leg and curls in, Duminy counters with a nudge to the on side
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run gently flighted up and he dabs the ball away for one
Hauritz to Duminy, no run tossed up and he plays it back
Hauritz to Duminy, no run tries to open the face and dab it fine but mistimes it poorly
Hauritz to Duminy, 1 run comes forward and knocks the ball toward midwicket for one
Hauritz to Kallis, no run shuffles across and works the ball to midwicket, cant find the gap
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run gets across and steers the ball to short third man
Hopes to Kallis, 2 runs pitches on the pads and another easy two to Kallis, clipped away
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run quicker ball, 129.3ks, Kallis cramped for room but expertly opens the face of the blade and guides the ball down to third man for one more to the total
Hopes to Duminy, no run hits a length and he plays this one out to the fielder
Hopes to Duminy, 1 run ah, close, hits a length and shaves away and Duminy dabs the ball at the last moment to short third man, who dives and fumbles and allows runs
Hopes to Kallis, 1 run gentle stuff on the stumps and pushed into the off side
Hopes to Duminy, FOUR runs not that short but Duminy pulls in front of square and beats the fielder
Hauritz to Kallis, no run tossed up on a teasing line, Kallis pushes and edges to the off side
Hauritz to Kallis, no run slows the pace, Kallis pushes to point and waves back Duminy
Hauritz to Kallis, no run pushes forward and inside-edges off the pad to short fine leg
Hauritz to Kallis, 1 run stays in his crease and works the ball away toward Bracken at point
Hauritz to Duminy, no run works this one away but cannot beat the fielders

Hauritz to Duminy, OUT bowled em! This one is tossed up outside off and purchases a bit of turn from the rough, cramping Duminy as he goes for a cut, stays low and a faint inside edge disturb off stump and thats an ODI wicket for Hauritz for the first time since Ma
Tait to Kallis, no run pitches and shapes back in, Kallis on-drives the ball to midwicket
Tait to Boucher, no run 146.3ks, short of a length and hit away to the off side first ball
Tait to Boucher, no run fuller on off stump and pushed down to mid-on
Tait to Boucher, 2 runs hops forward and pushes the ball back, thats some tidy bowling
Tait to Boucher, no run bangs it in and Boucher hops up to defend it back to Tait
Hauritz to McKenzie, no run tossed up wide, spins back in and McKenzie keeps bat tucked inside
Hauritz to McKenzie, 2 runs uses his feet and works the ball into the on side for a couple
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run gets across and whips it from outside off stump to wide of mid-on
Hauritz to Boucher, no run gently lobbed up on a length, he comes up and pushes it away
Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run gets back and plays this one to the fielder
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run comes across and knocks the ball to the on side
Hopes to McKenzie, no run hits a length and he can only defend that to the off side
Hopes to McKenzie, no run very tidy stuff on top of off stump, defended to backward point
Hopes to McKenzie, no run gets a wider one and steers it to Ponting, sliding at short cover
Hopes to McKenzie, no run a tad fuller but still McKenzie fails to find the gap, driving to Ponting
Hopes to McKenzie, 2 runs at last he gets one, rising up and forcing the ball wide of point
Hopes to McKenzie, 1 run pitches on off stump and straightens, on-driven down the ground
Tait to McKenzie, no run 148.3ks, pitched up outside off and he leaves it be
Tait to McKenzie, no run hits a length on off stump, on the seam, and McKenzie defends
Tait to McKenzie, no run full and tailing back, hits the pads but clearly missing leg stump
Tait to McKenzie, no run full down the pads, brushes something and Haddin flings himself around to his left to pouch the ball, appeals for the catch and replays show it brushed the pads
Tait to McKenzie, 1 run banged in short, 150.1ks, McKenzie deflects it to square leg
Tait to Boucher, 1 run short of a length and Boucher steers it down to third man for one
Hopes to Boucher, no run pitches on middle and off and he pushes the ball to midwicket
Hopes to Boucher, no run back of a length, cramps him and he plays the ball to point
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run gets a wider one and squirts it down to third man for one
Hopes to McKenzie, no run fuller in length and he mistimes the drive to Ponting at cover
Hopes to McKenzie, 1 run nips back in but he angles the face and steers one to third man
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run a much straighter delivery, which Boucher on-drives for a single

Tait to Boucher, no run oh its all happening at the SCG! First Tait fires in a lovely late-swinging yorker that nearly snaps the batsman's toes, but it was missing leg stump, then he sets off for leg byes and gets sent back, the nonstriker stumbles, the throw misse
Tait to Boucher, 1 run another yorker, this one honing into off stump, Boucher just manages to squirt the bat down on the ball and inside-edges back past the stumps and wide of Haddin
Tait to McKenzie, no run full toss on the stumps and thats pushed straight to cover
Tait to McKenzie, no run hits a good length and he dabs the ball to backward point
Tait to McKenzie, no run another low full toss on the stumps, pushed to mid-on, who is quick
Tait to McKenzie, (no ball) oversteps, pitches it full and wide, Boucher cannot connect well, Haddin runs in to collect and we have the first free hit of the match
Tait to McKenzie, no run full and wide, sliced to backward point, where David Hussey intercepts
Hopes to Boucher, no run pitches back of a length and Boucher defends to point
Hopes to Boucher, no run fuller in length and Boucher plays it back to Hopes
Hopes to Boucher, no run short of a length on middle and off and Boucher punches to midwicket
Hopes to Boucher, no run slips it in again, Boucher gets up and cannot time it well at all
Hopes to Boucher, 1 run too wide this time so Boucher cuts a single out to deep cover
Hopes to McKenzie, 1 run nips back in off a length and he steers it toward backward point
Johnson to McKenzie, no run full and low full toss outside off stump, squirted to cover
Johnson to McKenzie, FOUR runs reaches out and squeezes it off the end of the bat, beating gully
Johnson to McKenzie, 1 run pitches and stays low and he plays it off the back foot to third man
Johnson to Boucher, 1 run back of a length and he shuffles, working the ball away
Johnson to McKenzie, 1 run ah, a loose edge as he feels for it and the ball drops in font of Haddin and first slip, that was a very poor shot and he's lucky it didn't carry
Johnson to Boucher, no run pitches full and wide and he drives on the up to Ponting at short cover
Bracken to McKenzie, no run pitches and angles across McKenzie, who pokes it to backward point
Bracken to McKenzie, no run walks into the shot and collects on the half-volley, pushing to cover
Bracken to McKenzie, no run comes forward and defends the ball down to backward point
Bracken to McKenzie, no run pitches outside leg stump, turned away to midwicket
Bracken to McKenzie, no run walks down the track, dabs the ball to the leg side and carries on walking and Boucher has to shoo him back as Bracken harries across and collects the ball
Bracken to McKenzie, no run jams in a yorker outside off stump, McKenzie hasn't a clue as he pokes at it, and thats another maiden from that man Bracken
Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run tossed up and thats flicked away wide of square leg for one
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run tossed up gently and McKenzie paddles it from outside off to the deep
Hauritz to Boucher, 2 runs another swipe across the stumps, into the massive space at midwicket, looks to be headed to the boundary but Warner sprints across and slides superbly to cut it off
Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run well played, going back and steering it wide of backward point
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run uses his feet and chips the ball wide of mid-on
Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run skips down and swats it with an inside edge to deep square leg
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run good bowling, full on the stumps, with some swing, but equally well picked and pushed back past Bracken, then Boucher notices that mid-off is slow and runs
Bracken to McKenzie, no run pitches in line and pushed back to the off side
Bracken to McKenzie, no run goes down to slog sweep but cannot pierce midwicket
Bracken to McKenzie, 1 run reaches out and steers the ball down to third man for one
Bracken to Boucher, no run gives him the charge and swings, but the ball stays low to beat him
Bracken to Boucher, no run hits a length and he pushes the ball down to extra cover
Hauritz to McKenzie, FOUR runs a boundary for McKenzie, whats this? Hauritz proposes, McKenzie makes room and drives inside-out over the covers, thats a shot the South Africans really enjoy
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run streaky one this time, running it off the face very loosely
Hauritz to Boucher, 2 wide drifts down the stumps and brushes away off Haddin's pads
Hauritz to McKenzie, 2 runs skips out and hits this over the bowler's head, well struck shot
Hauritz to McKenzie, 1 run gets across and hits this out to Michael Hussey in the deep

Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run, OUT lovely arm from that man Warner! Boucher skips out, collects on the full and flicks through midwicket, a well-struck shot that but then out of the blue comes Warner, huffing and puffing and collecting and throwing it back to Hauritz,
Hauritz to Boucher, no run tossed up, he gets across and bunts the ball to midwicket
Johnson to Morkel, no run goes fishing very first delivery and gets beaten by a whisker
Johnson to Morkel, 2 runs short of a length and he gets up to steer the ball wide of point
Johnson to Morkel, FOUR runs backs away and slices the short ball flush between cover and point
Johnson to Morkel, FOUR runs served up on a length and Albie clears the front leg, gets to the pitch and smokes that handsomely over mid-on for four
Johnson to Morkel, no run the response is true fast bowler's, banged in short at 144.4ks to get Albie falling back on his haunches

Johnson to Morkel, FOUR runs and now its Tait's turn to drop a catch! Albie moves back to expose all three stick and then slices that from on top of middle and off, its in the air and running down to Tait, sprinting across from third man, who dives and cups it but
Tait to Boucher, 2 runs pitches full on the stumps, pushed back past mid-on and they hustle
Tait to Boucher, no run 147ks, on the stumps and defended back to Tait
Tait to Boucher, no run hits a length, Boucher gets to the pitch and punches over Tait's head
Tait to Boucher, 1 run well bowled yorker, which he somehow digs out to point
Tait to Morkel, no run makes room and flat-bats it very firmly down to Marsh at mid-off
Tait to Morkel, 1 run chases a low full toss and slices it off the edge wide of backward point
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run slower delivery, Albie makes room and just gets bat on it, steering it to the off side and setting off, a bit of hesitation but they cross as Tait fields and flings it back
Bracken to Boucher, no run full toss, hit nowhere but back to Bracken, who fields it well
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run gives him the charge but can only hit the ball to midwicket for one
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run crafty little slower ball, full on about off stump, Morkel clears the front leg and drives, getting a little inside edge back onto his boot, but scampers the single
Bracken to Boucher, FOUR runs lovely timing and placement from Boucher, using his feet to get over the attempted yorker, then improvising with a chipped flick between midwicket and mid-on
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run carves a low full toss to Hauritz at short third man, who fumbles and allows a single
Tait to Boucher, 1 run pitches on off stump and Boucher pinches a single to extra cover
Tait to Morkel, 1 run makes room and drives to extra cover, where Ponting tumbles and stops
Tait to Boucher, 1 run quick yorker down leg stump, Boucher clears the toe and jams it out
Tait to Morkel, no run pitches on the stumps and he plays it back to Tait
Tait to Morkel, no run another yorker, this one two feet outside off stump to beat the bat
Tait to Morkel, (no ball) 1 run attempted yorker on off stump, again Morkel backs away and steers the ball toward third man and scampers off, Tait has over-stepped so another free hit
Tait to Boucher, 1 run makes room, Tait pitches full, and Boucher drives it to extra cover
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run slips up a wide full toss and Bracken cuts it past point for one
Bracken to Morkel, 2 runs whoa there, Albie! Once more he moves outside leg stump and goes for a cut, this time just scooping it over a leaping Marsh at point
Bracken to Morkel, 1 run pitches and slants into leg stump, Albie coolly tucks it for a single
Bracken to Boucher, no run fuller ball outside off and Boucher hits it back to Bracken
Bracken to Boucher, 1 run very full again and this time Boucher squeezes it wide of point
Bracken to Morkel, FOUR runs full down leg stump, Albie also moves away and flicks with it away for four, a shot of immense confidence and whats more, he's picked out the gap to ease the pressure
Hauritz to Boucher, 1 run sweeps from outside off stump into the gap behind square leg

Hauritz to Morkel, SIX runs there she goes! Albie doesn't waste a second in sizing up Hauritz, who tosses it up from around the stumps, down he goes, clearing the front leg and depositing that into the second tier above midwicket, what a stunning hit
Hauritz to Morkel, FOUR runs swings across the line again, miscuing this one up into the starry night, Marsh runs across from midwicket and dives in vain, just missing what would have been a blinder
Hauritz to Morkel, FOUR runs swings again and pings the midwicket ropes, what fun he is
Hauritz to Morkel, no run smartly fired in wider and Albie has a swing and a miss

Hauritz to Morkel, OUT one hit too many, trying to finish it off with a six, but he doesn't get the desired power on the slog and the ball is taken down at wide long-on by Hopes, running around and sliding onto his knees to complete a good catch
Tait to Botha, no run full outside off stump, he kneels down and drives to extra cover
Tait to Botha, no run fuller still, inviting the drive, but Botha watches it go to Haddin
Tait to Botha, 1 wide too wide this time, wobbling away, Botha chases and misses

Tait to Botha, FOUR runs lovely shot off bent knee, Tait pitches full and wide and Botha gets to the pitch, driving a classy shot between the covers, and thats it for Australia as South Africa go up 2-1
We've been Jamie Alter and Sanjay Murari. Until the next game from Adelaide on Jan 26, thats it from Cricinfo.
Not much dispute in the fact that Albie is the Man of the Match for his 22-ball 40.

Just a quick recap for anyone who was late to join in. Australia batted first and set a target of 270. Despite a quick start, they were bowled out for 269 in 49.s overs. Botha was in the thick of things, taking 3 for 32 in his 10 overs and two smart catches. In reply for
South Africa won by 3 wickets (with 21 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Albie Morkel, SA
